meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_image

languageKey.label: The image's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
A short description of the image.
The actual image that this image record is for. This is a reference to an image in fileadmin.
A caption for this image.
The date that this image should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this image should stop showing up in the FE.
